titleStmt.title: OXFORD AND CAMBRIDGE ISLAMIC MANUSCRIPTS CATALOGUE ONLINE

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Short general astronomical work in 16 faṣls beginning “al-Faṣl al-awwal fī rusūm al-kurah.”
msItem.note: * though not individually mentioned f. (iv) is blank; f. (iii) contains note on the Conics by Ravius; f. (v)r contains short geometrical work

msItem.author: Shīrāzī, Abū al-Ḥusain ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Muḥammad, fl. late 12th cent.
msItem.title: Kitāb Taṣaffuḥ al-Makhrūṭāt, a compendium of the Conica of Apollonius of Perga.
msItem.note: f. 1r contains note of ownership and partial list of contents for the MS.

msItem.author: Kamāl al-Dīn Mūsá ibn Yūnus 1156-1242.
msItem.title: Risālah fī bayān al-muqaddimatain muhmalatai al-bayān ista ʻmalahā Abūlūniyūs fī awākhir al-maqālat al-ūlá min Kitāb al-Makhrūṭāt.

msItem.author: Abū al-Wafāʼ al-Būzajānī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 940-997 or 998.
msItem.title: Jawāb Abī al-Wafāʼ ... ʻammā saʼalahu al-faqīh Abū ʻAlī al-Ḥasan ibn Ḥārith ... [fī] misāḥat al-muthallathāt.

msItem.author: Karābisī, Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar, fl. late 9th cent.
msItem.title: Kitāb fī Miaāḥat al-ḥalaq.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Geometrical problem entitled “Masʼalah handasīyah”, beginning “Kull muthallath musāwī al-aḍlāʻ maʻlūm al-misāḥah ...”

msItem.author: Abū al-Wafāʼ al-Būzajānī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 940-997 or 998.
msItem.title: Masʼalah li-Arshimīdis fī misāḥat al-muthallath.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Geometrical problem entitled “Faṣl fī burhān masqaṭ al-ḥajar fī al-muthallathāt al-ḥāddat al-zawāyā.”

msItem.author: Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ*, Abū al-Futūḥ Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, d. 1153.
msItem.title: Two geometrical problems.

msItem.author: Shīrāzī, Quṭb al-Dīn Maḥmūd ibn Masʻūd, d. 1311.
msItem.title: Multaqaṭāt min Kitāb al-Majisṭī ʻalá ḥasab iṣlāh baʻḍ al-mutaʼakhkhirīn. A compendium of Ptolemyʼs Almagest in Ṭūsīʼs recension.

msItem.author: Abharī, Athīr al-Dīn Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar, d. 1264.
msItem.title: Fawāʼid multaqaṭah min K. ʻInāyat al-idrāk fī dirāyat al-aflāk.

Three short works relating to the Almagest (? in Ṭūsīʼs recension) entitled (i) Muʼāmarat aʻmāl dhakarahā fī hadhā al-Majisṭī (ii) Muqaddimah fī taʻyīn nuqṭatai al-wuqūf ʻalá kull wāḥid min al-aṣlain (iii) Min al-maqālat al-thālithah ʻashar min al-Majisṭī.

msItem.author: Kūshyār ibn Labbān fl. c. 966.
msItem.title: Faṣl fī taʻdīl azmān al-khusūf, apparently from al-Zīj al-jāmiʻ.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Masʼalah fī maʻná ayyām al-ʻālam.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Two problema on the circle.

msItem.author: Shīrāzī, Quṭb al-Dīn Maḥmūd ibn Masʻūd, d. 1311.
msItem.title: Fawāʼid min al-kitāb. al-mausūm bil-Majisṭī li-Ibn Aflaḥ. A compendium of Jābir ibn Aflaḥʼs astronomical work known as Kitāb al-Haiʼah or Iṣlāḥ al-Majisṭī.

msItem.author: Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ**, Abū al-Futūḥ Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, f. 1153.
msItem.title: Masʼalah fī al-alwān allatī taḥduthu fī ʻain qaus quzaḥ.

msItem.author: Abū Saʻd al-ʻAlāʼ ibn Sahl fl. late 10th cent.
msItem.title: al-Burhān ʻalá anna al-falak laisa huwa fī ghāyat al-ṣafāʼ ... ʻind taṣaffuḥihi li-K. Baṭlamiyūs fī al-manāẓir.

msItem.author: Abū al-Qāsim Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Jaʻfar al- ?.
msItem.title: Risālah fī simt al-qiblah.

msItem.author: Abū al-Ḥasan ibn Bāmshād, ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh, fl. 10th cent.
msItem.title: Risālah fī istikhrāj sāʻāt mā bain ṭulūʻ al-fajr wa-ṭulūʻ al- shams . . ., extract only.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Risālah fī istikhrāj daqāʼiq ḥudūd ikhtilāf manẓar al-qamar al-mustaʻmalah fī al-Majisṭī.

msItem.author: Battānī, Muḥammad ibn Jābir, d. 929.
msItem.title: Problem based on the 9th bāb of his Zīj.

msItem.author: Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ**, Abū al-Futūh Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, d. 1153.
msItem.title: al-Maʻná dhakarahu Baṭlamiyūs fī al-bāb al-thānī min al-maqālah al-thāniyah ʻashar fī maʻrifah miqdār rujūʻ Zuḥal wa-fī al-abwāb al-arbaʻah allatī baʻdahu li-rujūʻ bāqī al-kawākib.

msItem.author: Ṣaghānī, Abū Ḥāmid Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, d. 990.
msItem.title: Istikhrāj khaṭṭ niṣf al-nahār.

msItem.author: Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ**, Abū al-Futūḥ Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, d. 1153.
msItem.title: Qaul fī sabab al-khaṭaʼ wa-al-taṣḥīf al-ʻāriḍain fī jadāwil al-maqālatain al-sābi ʻah wa-al-thāminah min Kitāb al-Majiaṭī wa-taṣḥīḥ mā amkana taṣḥīḥuhu min dhalika.
msItem.note: ** also known as Ibn al-Sarī Ed. with German translation by P. Kunitzsch, 1975.

msItem.title: Questions and answers relating to the Almagest (? in Ṭūsīʼs recension).

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Jawāb shakk fī ikhtilāf manẓar al-qamar min shukūk Abī al-Qāsim ibn Maʻdān.

msItem.author: Thābit ibn Qurrah, Abū al-Ḥasan, al-Ṣābī c. 834-901 [attrib.].
msItem.title: Faṣl fī al-ṭarīq alladhī bihi ʻalima Baṭlamiyūs anna markaz al-ḥāmil fī kull wāḥid min al-kawākib al-ʻalawīyah ʻalá muntaṣaf mā bain markazai al-burūj wa-muʻaddal al-masīr.

msItem.author: Thābit ibn Qurrah, Abū al-Ḥasan, al-Ṣābī c. 834-901.
msItem.title: Risālah fī ḥarakat al-nayyirain.

msItem.author: ?Simyāṭī.
msItem.title: Three short geometrical problems, two relating to arcs.

msItem.author: Ibn al-Haitham, Abū ʻAlī al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥasan, 965-1038.
msItem.title: Min kalām Ibn al-Haitham fī risālah fī anna al-ẓāhir min al-samāʼ akthar min niṣfihi.

msItem.author: Jābir ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ṣābī fl. 10th cent.
msItem.title: Maqālah fī haiʼah aflāk ʻUṭārid wa-ikhtilāf marākizihā wa-masīrihā, followed by (ff. 105r-107r) various muqaddimāt relating to figures in the Almagest.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Burhān mā qālahu Baṭlamiyūs fī al-shakl al-rābiʻ min al-maqālah al-thāniyah ʻashar [of the Almagest].

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Two astronomical works on the sun, the first entitled “Faṣl fī kaifīyah raṣd al-shams”, the second “Mauḍiʻ al-auj al-shams [sic].”

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: ʻAlá al-shakl al-rābiʻ min tāsiʻah [sic] al-Majisṭī.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Two astronomical works, the first being several muqaddimahs on rujūʻ, the second entitled “Masʼalah fī al-rujūʻ wa-al-istiqāmah.”

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Three muqaddimahs on the circle.

msItem.author: Ibn ʻIrāk, Abū Naṣr Manṣūr ibn ʻAlī, d. > 1036.
msItem.title: Risālah jadwal al-daqāʼiq.

msItem.author: Ibn al-Haitham, Abū ʻAlī al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥasan, 965-1038.
msItem.title: Maqālah fī anna al-ẓāhir min al-samāʼ akthar min niṣfihi, followed by Maqālah ukhrá fī anna al-dāʼirah wa-al-kurah ausaʻ al-ashkāl ...

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: A fāʼidah purporting to have been transmitted by Ṭūsī, who discovered it written on a copy of ?al-Zīj al-ʻalāʼī, with (below) a note from ?Zīj al-iqbāl.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Several fāʼidahs on Kūshyār ibn Labbānʼs al-Zīj al-jāmiʻ.

msItem.author: ?Ḥāzimī.
msItem.title: Maqālah fī ittikhādh kurah tadūru bi-dhātihā bi-ḥarakah musāwiyah li-ḥarakat al-falak.

msItem.author: Ṣaghānī, Abū Ḥāmid Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, d. 990.
msItem.title: Risālah fī sāʻāt al-maʻmūlah ʻalá ṣafāʼiḥ al-asṭurlāb, faṣl 1 only.

msItem.author: Bīrūnī, Abū al-Raiḥān Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, d. 1048.
msItem.title: Kitāb fī Tashīl al-tasṭīḥ al-asṭurlābī wa-al-ʻamal bi-murakkabāt al-shamālī wa-al-janūbī.**

msItem.author: Ibn ʻIrāq, Abū Naṣr Manaṣūr ibn ʻAlī, d. > 1036.
msItem.title: Risālah fī ṣanʻat al-asṭurlāb bil-ṭarīq al-ṣināʻī.

msItem.author: Ibn ʻIrāq, Abū Naṣr Manṣūr ibn ʻAlī, d. > 1036.
msItem.title: Risālah fī majāzāt dawāʼir al-sumūt fī al-asṭurlāb.

msItem.author: Ibn ʻIrāq, Abū Naṣr Manṣūr ibn ʻAlī, d. > 1036.
msItem.title: Risālah fī al-dawāʼir allatī taḥuddu al-sāʻāt al-zamānīyah.

msItem.author: Kamāl al-Dīn Mūsá ibn Yūnus 1156-1242.
msItem.title: Risālah fī al-burhān ʻalá ittikhādh al-muqaddimat allatī ahmalahā Arshimīdis fī tasbīʻ al-dāʼirah wa-kaifīyah dhalika.

msItem.author: Sijzī [or Sijazī], Abū Saʻīd Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, fl. late 10th cent.
msItem.title: Maqālah fī ʻamal al-musabbaʻ fī al-dāʼirah wa-qismat al-zāwiyat al-mustaqīmat al-khaṭṭain bi-thalāthah aqsām mutasāwiyah.

msItem.author: Abū Sahl al-Kūhī, Waijan ibn Rustam, fl. late 10th cent.
msItem.title: Risālah fī ḍilʻ al-musabbaʻ al-mutasāwī al-aḍlāʻ fī al-dāʼirah.

msItem.author: Abū Sahl al-Kūhī, Waijan ibn Ruatam, fl. late 10th cent.
msItem.title: Maqalah fī tathlīth al-zāwiyah wa-ʻamal al-musabbaʻ al-musāwī al-aḍlāʻ fī al-dāʼirah.

msItem.author: ʻAzīzī, Naṣr ibn ʻAbd Allāh, fl. late 10th cent.
msItem.title: Risālah fī istikhrāj watar al-musabbaʻ.

msItem.author: Aḥmad ibn Mūsá ibn Shākir fl. 9th cent.
msItem.title: Qaul fī tathlīth al-zāwiyat al-mustaqīmat al-khaṭṭain.

msItem.author: Ibn al-Haitham, Abū ʻAlī al-Ḥasan ibn al-Ḥasan, 965-1038.
msItem.title: Min kalām Ibn al-Haitham ʻalá muqaddimah Arshimīdis fī ḍilʻ al-musabbaʻ.

msItem.author: Abū al-Jūd, Muḥammad ibn al-Laith, fl. c. 1009.
msItem.title: Risālah ilá Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥāsib fī ṭarīqai Abī Sahl al-Qūhī wa-shaikhihi Abī Hāmid al-Saghānī fī ʻamal al-musabbaʻ al-musāwī al-aḍlāʻ fī al-dāʼirah.

msItem.author: Thābit ibn Qurrah, Abū al-Ḥasan, al-Ṣābī c. 834-901.
msItem.title: Muqaddimāt.

msItem.author: Jābir ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ṣābī fl. 10th cent.
msItem.title: Īḍāḥ al-burhān ʻalá ḥisāb al-khaṭaʼain, with the glossary of Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ.
Burhān ʻalá ʻamal ḥisāb al-khaṭaʼain.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Masāʼil handasīyah mutarjamah bil-Muhdāt wa-hiya muqaddimāt li-masāʼil jabrīyah ustukhrijat bil-handasah.

msItem.author: Hāshimī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz, fl. 10th cent.
msItem.title: [al-] R. al-mausūmah bil-Mūḍiḥah fī ḥisāb al-judhūr al-ṣumm ilá al-amīr Abī al-Faḍl Jaʻfar ibn al-Muktafī billah.

msItem.author: Abū Jaʻfar Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Khāzin d. 961-971.
msItem.title: al-Burhān al-khuṭūṭī.

msItem.author: Thābit ibn Qurrah, Abū al-Ḥasan, al-Ṣābī c. 834-901.
msItem.title: Qaul fī taṣḥīḥ masāʼil al-jabr bil-barāhīn al-handasīyah.

msItem.author: Ahwāzī, Abū al-Ḥusain Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusain, fl. 10th cent.
msItem.title: Kalimāt min Sharḥ al-maqālat al-ʻāshirah min [K.] Uqlīdis, in 8 faṣls.

msItem.author: Jūzajāni, Abū ʻUbaid ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn Muḥammad, fl. 11th cent.
msItem.title: al-Mukhtaṣar fī maʻná falak muʻaddal al-masīr wa-maʻná al-mail wa-al-iltiwāʼ wa-al-inḥirāf li-aflāk al-tadāwīr. An abstract of his K. Kaifīyah tarkīb al-aflāk.
msItem.note: Different hand from main contents of MS.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Treatise on the apogee and perigee of Mars.
msItem.note: Different hand from main contents of MS.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Ḥikāyah mā ṣaddarahu ... Naṣīr ... al-Din ... al-Ṭūsī li-Kitāb al-Makhrūṭāt li-Abulūniyūs.
msItem.note: Different hand from main contents of MS.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Extract from an anonymous Arabic version of Simpliciusʼ commentary on the premises to bk.1 of Euclidʼs Elements.**
msItem.note: ff. 148v, 149r, v contain short notes; ff. 150, 151 (ult.) are blank
** A.I.Sabra, Journal of the Warburg and Courtauld Institutes, vol. 32, pp. 1-24

history.provenance: [Any information about a single identifiable episode in the life of the manuscript between origin and acquisition]

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact oriental@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript
